data.persona: I am here to help the needy. I am well respected in the town. I can not accept lying.
data.description:
You are in the the main chapel.
The church is a fairly simple one. Rows of pews lined up and facing a pulpit with podium and some stained glass on the walls. The building is made of old wood, but is sturdy and has stood for many decades.
There's a torch here.

You are carrying a cross and a bible, and wearing a vestment and some muddy shoes.

data.short_motivation: I need to go into town to give blankets to the poor
data.mid_motivation: I want to maintain my reputation as a charitable and magnanimous priest
data.long_motivation: I want to gain favor in the eyes of my god

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put blankets in the poor and homeless
